FuncDef: The display radius-attribute server-group packet command displays attributes carried in various packets in a specified RADIUS server group.
CLIs: display radius-attribute server-group <server-group-name> packet { access-request | access-accept | access-reject | accounting-request | accounting-response | coa-request | coa-ack | coa-nak | dm-request | dm-ack | dm-nak | accounting-on | accounting-off }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays attributes carried in RADIUS Access-Request packets.
-

Displays attributes carried in RADIUS Access-Accept packets.
-

Displays attributes carried in RADIUS Access-Reject packets.
-

Displays attributes carried in RADIUS Accounting-Request packets.
-

Displays attributes carried in RADIUS Accounting-Response packets.
-

Displays attributes carried in RADIUS COA-Request packets.
-

Displays attributes carried in RADIUS COA-ACK packets.
-

Displays attributes carried in RADIUS COA-NAK packets.
-

Displays attributes carried in RADIUS DM-Request packets.
-

Displays attributes carried in RADIUS DM-ACK packets.
-

Displays attributes carried in RADIUS DM-NAK packets.
-

Displays attributes carried in RADIUS Accounting-On packets.
-

Displays attributes carried in RADIUS Accounting-Off packets.
-

Specifies the name of a RADIUS server group.
The name is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display radius-attribute server-group g1 packet accounting-on
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display radius-attribute packet command allows you to view the attributes carried in various packets in a specified RADIUS server group. This process displays the attributes of the specified packets based on the type and name of attributes.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
